Package jparsec.astronomy

Provides classes for general astronomy tasks.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Astrometry
    A class to process plate photographs/CCD images and perform astrometry.
    AtlasChart
    A class to obtain the chart that best shows a given position in different atlases.
    CCDElement
    A class to hold and to calculate the properties of a CCD camera or webcam.
    Colors
    Class to transform color indexes between several systems.
    Constellation
    This class contains methods to get the constellation corresponding to a given equatorial position.
    CoordinateSystem
    A class to perform coordinates transformations.
    Difraction
    Implements difraction correction to sky images, in order to make them look as through a telescope.
    OcularElement
    A class to hold and to calculate the properties of an ocular.
    Star
    Class that performs some simple calculations about star properties, including simple photometry and extinction.
    TelescopeElement
    A class to hold and to calculate the properties of a telescope.
    VariableStar
    Performs some useful calculations as getting the string representation of a variable number and vice versa.
    VisualLimit
    Calculates sky brightness and limiting magnitude.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AtlasChart.ATLAS
    The set of atlas types.
    Constellation.CONSTELLATION_NAME
    Types of constellations names.
    CoordinateSystem.COORDINATE_SYSTEM
    The set of available coordinate systems.
    Star.LUMINOSITY_CLASS
    The set of luminosity classes.

Package jparsec.astronomy Description

Provides classes for general astronomy tasks.

This package contains algorithms designed to obtain the constellation from an equatorial position, transform index colors, calculate sky brightness, and other general astronomical applications.
